member.name: T:QModManager.API.IQMod
member.summary: All public data about a QMod.

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.Id
member.summary:
The ID of the mod
Can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores: (, , , )

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.DisplayName
member.summary: The display name of the mod

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.Author
member.summary: The author of the mod

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.SupportedGame
member.summary: The game this mod was developed for.

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.RequiredMods
member.summary: The dependencies of the mod and their optional minimum required version

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.ModsToLoadBefore
member.summary: A list of mods, before which, this mod will load

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.ModsToLoadAfter
member.summary: A list of mods, after which, this mod will load

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.LoadedAssembly
member.summary:
The assembly of this mod
Check if before using

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.AssemblyName
member.summary: The assembly name of the mod

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.ParsedVersion
member.summary: The version of the mod.

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.Enable
member.summary: Whether or not this mod is enabled

member.name: P:QModManager.API.IQMod.IsLoaded
member.summary: Whether or not this mod has been loaded

member.name: T:QModManager.API.IQModAPI
member.summary: An set of services provided by QModManager for mods to use.

member.name: M:QModManager.API.IQModAPI.GetAllMods
member.summary: Gets a list all mods being tracked by QModManager.
member.returns: A read only list of mods containing all of the loaded mods

member.name: M:QModManager.API.IQModAPI.GetMyMod
member.summary: Returns the mod from the assembly which called this method

member.summary: Returns a mod from an

member.name: M:QModManager.API.IQModAPI.GetMod(System.String)
member.summary: Finds a specific mod by its unique value.
member.returns: The instance of the mod if found; otherwise returns null.

member.name: M:QModManager.API.IQModAPI.ModPresent(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether or not a mod is present based on its unique value.
member.returns: True if the mod is in the collection of mods to load; Otherwise false.

member.name: T:QModManager.API.ModLoading.QModPatch
member.summary:
Identifies a normal patch method for a QMod.
This method must be public, must take no parameters, and must return either or .
ALERT: The class that defines this method must have a attribute.

member.name: M:QModManager.API.ModLoading.QModPatch.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for normal patching.

member.name: T:QModManager.API.ModLoading.QModPostPatch
member.summary:
Identifies a post-patch method for a QMod.
This method must be public, must take no parameters, and must return either or .
ALERT: The class that defines this method must have a attribute.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:QModManager.Patching.IQModFactory.BuildModLoadingList(System.String)
member.summary:
Searches through all folders in the provided directory and returns an ordered list of mods to load.
Mods that cannot be loaded will have an unsuccessful value.
member.returns: A new, sorted ready to be initialized or skipped.
